levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Lose 15 SP
If this unit is Fanatic, deal +15% damage
If target is a <Mechanical Amalgam>, deal +10% damage
levelList.name: Self-destructive Purge

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Raise Stagger Threshold by 50% of damage dealt
[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 5+ Bleed, inflict 5 Burn
[EnemyKill] Gain 1 Blunt Power Up next turn
